messages.title: A General Election will be held on December 12th.
messages.content: When that election comes, every vote for the SNP will make sure Westminster can’t ignore the right of the people of Scotland to determine our own future. I write to ask for your support to ensure that Glasgow Central continues to have an experienced campaigner who will fight on your behalf in Westminster.

mentions.candidate: Since I became your MP in 2015, I have taken on over fifteen thousand constituent cases. In the last year alone, I've ensured that over £75,000 in underpaid social security has gone into the pockets of those who need it the most.

issues.brexitEurope: over the past four years, I've worked hard on the issues that matter to you. I've consistently voted against a damaging no deal Brexit
issues.economy: I've ensured that over £75,000 in underpaid social security has gone into the pockets of those who need it the most.
issues.environment: I have taken the Home Office to task over their cruel hostile environment policies
issues.health: I've supervised drug consumption facilities, which would protect residents from needles and save lives from overdose.
issues.immigration: threatened with eviction and deportation and opposed the DWP’s cruel and pernicious tactic of living able people
issues.socialWelfare: I've ensured that over £75,000 in underpaid social security has gone into the pockets of those who need it the most.

politicalExperience.achievements: taken on over fifteen thousand constituent cases. In the last year alone, I've ensured that over £75,000 in underpaid social security has gone into the pockets of those who need it the most.

contactInformation.address: Glasgow Central SNP, 68 St Vincent Terrace, Glasgow G3 8DX
